backend/main.mo: Actor handling access control, automatic user registration, user profile storage, and blob-storage mixin setup.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change for the custom tool manager and its associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for build reference.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component managing authentication, profile setup modal, and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/CustomToolManage: Dialog for creating, editing, and managing custom tools with draft-friendly commaâ€‘separated option inputs.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and allows page reload on errors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting Internet Identity login and showcasing app features with cards.
frontend/src/components/ModelBuilder.tsx: Main UI for creating and editing ICT trading models with predefined and custom tools.
frontend/src/components/ModelCardSummary: Displays a concise review of model details and selected tools before saving.
frontend/src/components/ModelWizard.tsx: Empty placeholder component for a model creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a new user's display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ToolConfigDialog: Dialog for editing detailed configuration properties of an ICT tool, including unified property schemas.
frontend/src/components/TradeDetailDialo: Dialog for reviewing and updating trade outcomes, reflections, emotions, and image uploads.
frontend/src/components/TradeForm.tsx: Large trade creation and editing form handling model selection, pricing inputs, validation, scenario calculations, and UI rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a react-query hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidate dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and an authentication provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for loading and mutating models, trades, and user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode palettes, and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, react-query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics dashboard computing trade metrics, adherence statistics, and visualizing them with charts and filters.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page fetching models and trades to compute trading stats, equity curve, recent trades, and top models, rendering charts and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/Models.tsx: Models page listing all trading models with create, edit, and delete actions, including a builder modal and deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/Trades.tsx: Trades page displaying, filtering, sorting, creating, viewing, editing, and deleting trades with model-aware status indicators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current feature set, schema version, and implemented frontend-backend functionality for the ICT trading logger.
